short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds glassdoor reviews to linkedin jobs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing GlassLink, the ultimate Chrome extension that bridges the gap between LinkedIn job posts and Glassdoor reviews. With GlassLink, job seekers can effortlessly access valuable insights about potential employers directly within LinkedIn's platform.
